name: okx-trader
description: Professional OKX grid trading system with dual-layer (Macro/Micro) strategy and automated trailing logic.
author: alz

tools.name: okx_report
tools.description: Generates a real-time trading report including trade counts, average prices, and pending order status for both Macro and Micro grids.

tools.name: okx_grid_maintain
tools.description: Maintains the grid structure on OKX. Automatically places missing orders, cancels stale ones, and performs grid re-centering (rescale) if the price drifts.

type.description: The bot type to maintain: 'main' (Macro Grid) or 'micro' (Micro Grid).

cronTemplates.name: OKX Hourly PnL Report
cronTemplates.description: Sends a formatted profit and loss summary every hour.

cronTemplates.name: OKX Grid Auto-Maintenance
cronTemplates.description: Checks and updates the grid every 5 minutes.
